mapper.select: SELECT record_id contractId, DATE_FORMAT(signed_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') signedAt, DATE_FORMAT(create_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') createAt, DATE_FORMAT(contract_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(contract_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') endTime, contract_state STATUS, third_contract_num thirdContractId, pay_total_money payTotal, witness_id czId, bank_of_deposit bankDeposit, bank_account_num bankNum, bank_user_name bankName FROM czb_contract_records WHERE record_id = #{contractId}

SELECT record_id payId, payee_name payToName, payee_id_card PersonCarId, contract_record_id contractId, payable_money shouldPay, actual_pay_money realPay, target_year_month yearMonth, DATE_FORMAT(platform_pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') payTime, state status FROM czb_pay_to_person WHERE contract_record_id = #{contractId} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT person_name, a.contract_record_id, receivable_money, actual_receipts_money, target_year_month, enterprise_pay_time, state, remark FROM czb_platform_income_records a LEFT JOIN czb_contract_records b ON a.contract_record_id = b.contract_father_id LEFT JOIN czb_cars_persons c ON b.record_id = c.contract_record_id WHERE b.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT SUM(a.actual_receipts_money) AS FROM czb_platform_income_records a LEFT JOIN czb_contract_records b ON a.contract_record_id = b.contract_father_id WHERE b.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND is_deleted = 0

SELECT record_id petrolRecordId, petrol_num petrolNum, buyer_id buyerId, payment_method payMethod, third_order_id thirdNum, turnover_amount amount, DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') makeTime, petrol_id petrolId, state status, contract_id contractId, petrol_kind petrolType FROM czb_petrol_sales_records WHERE contract_id = #{contractId} AND record_type = 0

SELECT record_id recordId, payment_method payMethod, turnover_amount amount, DATE_FORMAT(transaction_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') makeTime, state status, petrol_kind petrolType, is_recharged isCharged FROM czb_petrol_sales_records WHERE petrol_id = #{petrolId} AND record_type = 1
